name: Jørgen Munkeby
description: '''Jørgen Munkeby''' (born 3 September 1980 in [[Oslo]], Norway) is a [[Norwegians|Norwegian]] [[jazz rock]] and [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] musician, singer, songwriter, and [[record producer]], known as the frontman in the band [[Shining (Norwegian band)|Shining]] and former member of [[Jaga Jazzist]].
